name: PUPPETEER WARS
description:
PUPPETEER WARS is a game about Ragdoll puppets in an 8-bit(ish) arena made in GameMaker Studio 2 for the GameMaker Studio 2 Beta Jam.

Didn't have too much time to work on this one, though it'll function as a proof of concept for my next game.

I started on implementing a Multiplayer function (and it works!) Had many more ideas to add; but a deadline is a deadline!

HOW TO PLAY:

Use [Arrow Keys] to cut the enemy puppets' strings. Be careful that they don't cut your strings or you will lose control of your puppet! (...and the game...)

SPECIAL THANKS:
